I understand that some taliban syndicate are against that, other that etc... very complex... only god knows :).

my simple point is that a taliban federation for at least a few points :

like uninvited foreigners out.
or... who knows... quran reading and writing course, mandatory :) for females, by even female teachers... who knows...

the thing is how to make the diversity coexist, not that it would weaken the whole (:)) but more...

after all you do like you want :) 

I guess it's the simpler answer...

but I really do like this idea of the afghan wide ummah... at least a place to discuss freely of anything...

maybe using some mastodon / matrix system, digital and irl...

as said peace !

myself I have a little subject dear to my hearth, it's water pollution run offs... for thousand of years afghan food was the cleanest in the world... among... so why trash it for a temporary unclean unprofessional mining extraction? it's the second with my teaching program for females : quaran (read, write), count and grow (crops) and care (family, children, animals etc)...

for me the talibans are the embodiment of courage and fearlessness...

while american forces were ultimately serving the pedofeodalist regime (Without knowing it), the talibans against the largest army at the time in the world, decided to honor their guesthood.
